title: Flamed By Riot Employee
body:
Order of Events:
**1. * We got invaded
2. * Enemy Shaco got First Blood
3. * Morgana Ganked mid at level 1, I got 4 sums off them, but no kill
4. * Tried to roam top, riot employee wouldn't cooperate in clearing red ward
5. * Roamed bot later, got bot lane 2 kills
6. * Shaco Ganked mid again
7. * Morgana Ganked mid again
8. * They dropped herald in my lane
9. * Got Ganked by Morgana and Shaco again at Tier 2 tower, I still haven't flamed or complained, at this point
10. * I asked my jungler to please apply some pressure somewhere, word for word.**

Apparently I'm not allowed to post the pictures of it.
It's ok if Riot does it apparently though.

There's more but I don't know how to "edit" out the name in the video, and going frame by frame on YouTube to capture the chat is REALLY tedious, i was in a 3 man party, he flamed in and post game

https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR1QV50.png
https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR1RWy9.png
https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR1Wz8u.png
https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR1XZcM.png
https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR1YT70.png
https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR1ZXdA.png
https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR20WRG.png
https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR22Jlz.png
https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR24HL2.png


Edit; Reformatted for clarity so people stop complaining about a non issue.

replies.body:
Your last image still showed most of the Rioter's name.

As was mentioned in your removal previously, reporting in the post game should suffice to have their behavior looked at, but if you did not, then I'd submit a support ticket.

EDIT: 4/18/19- Locking due to necro.

If you have any questions about this moderation, feel free to reach out to us in the [Boards Discord](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).
Dude, we can all look on op.gg and see it anyway
That doesn't change the fact that it's against the [_Boards Universal Rules_](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/ITFIpNUE) to call out names and start witch hunts.
Yeah but its a bit different if it's a rioter. I've gotten chat restricted for this kind of thing, and it pisses me off that rioters do it too and people should know who it is.

@periscope I'm sure you won't mind that I've forwarded this story, your name and response to several media outlets. Your company does so seem to love screaming about the media being out to get you. 

I'm sure riot will be contacted for an official comment soon!
Iâ€™m heavily invested in knowing how that plays out.

Nothing will happen. It's Christmas. The rioters account probably don't have enough history to even get a flag, as for OP, probably will get a ban soon. May or may not be related to this. Bad investment bud. ðŸ˜œðŸ˜œðŸ˜‚
If riot bans a memeber who has a legitimate concern with the game/an employee, then there is a huge issue to the point were I don't think you quite understand what you are encouraging with this post.

Hey Everyone, that's me in the OP-

I crossed the line, no excuses- I tilted, lost control, and said things I shouldn't have. I apologize to Vemira, everyone in that game, and all of you. As a Rioter, I need to hold myself to a higher standard and set an example for players, and I didn't do that here.

-Riot STR Archer

> [{quoted}](name=Riot STR Archer,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KeZLXXXH,comment-id=0052,timestamp=2018-12-10T22:48:08.690+0000)
>
> Hey Everyone, that's me in the OP-
> 
> I crossed the line, no excuses- I tilted, lost control, and said things I shouldn't have. I apologize to Vemira, everyone in that game, and all of you. As a Rioter, I need to hold myself to a higher standard and set an example for players, and I didn't do that here.
> 
> -Riot STR Archer

Hey I sent you a friend request on League of Legends, so we can talk about this privately.

> [{quoted}](name=Malignant Vemira,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KeZLXXXH,comment-id=00520004,timestamp=2018-12-10T23:45:10.665+0000)
>
> Hey I sent you a friend request on League of Legends, so we can talk about this privately.

Heya, I'll be online in a little bit- got some work stuff to wrap up.

Were you punished like every other "chat toxic" people in the game, or are they more lenient with employees?

Also, i was totally shocked a Riot employee knows the expression: "soft inting". Do you mind telling the responsible people to do something about it? xD

> [{quoted}](name=Aladoron,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KeZLXXXH,comment-id=0052000c,timestamp=2018-12-11T12:16:15.683+0000)
>
> Were you punished like every other "chat toxic" people in the game, or are they more lenient with employees?
> 
> Also, i was totally shocked a Riot employee knows the expression: "soft inting". Do you mind telling the responsible people to do something about it? xD

I trust that our system is not calibrated to give Rioters extra leniency, but to be extra careful that I don't fall through the cracks I've specifically asked for a review of my chat. We won't disclose any punishment here but we hold ourselves to the same standard as you and then some.
It happens, even to the best of us. Thanks for stopping by and offering an apology.

@Riot Games, please promote Riot STR Archer. Have to respect when someone owns up to their mistakes like this. Not enough people do.

I'd offer you a beer, but alas the bottle wont fit through my computer screen. *grumbles about insufficiently advanced technology*

yep thats the honorable thing to do definitely.

i have some doubts about whether he came to this decision on his own for the right reasons...

but hopefully you are right and he is just a good guy.  good job STR Archer

~~So ... where's the flame?~~

I see you uploaded those images.  

Rioters aren't required to be saints.  But if they are found to be consistently toxic on their Rioter account, they can lose their jobs. 

Either way, this is one game of a tilted behavior. Any player (not just Rioters) will  require a bunch more of similar games before they get punished.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KeZLXXXH,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-10T03:27:08.946+0000)
>
> So ... where's the flame?

You don't see lines where rioter is saying, and I quote:

'You throwing is toxic'

'was fun playing with a soft inting Talon'

3rd and 4th picture are showing that rioter is blaming Talon, or how people on PB like to call, harrassing him for being the only lane who lost and saying he threw and fed in the game

6th picture shows rioter pointing out Talon's actions

and finally 8th picture shows him ONCE again blaming Talon for feeding and throwing


In total, rioter called out Talon several times for feeding/throwing, with one time going on mini-rant about how he's the only lane which lost (throwing all fault at him)

Last time I checked people were getting banned for shit like these and other Board users pointed these sort of things as 'toxic', and I'm pretty sure you were one of them aswell.
So stop pretending like Rioter did nothing, cuz he was definitely toxic in this game.

I think that summoners need to start learning the difference between complaining and flaming. Everyone is so quick to use the word " toxic" or "flame" at anything that is not in agreement with what they are saying. I see absolutely ZERO flaming or toxicity in this thread. Yes the riot employee may not be praising the talon, but he certainly isn't name calling, he's not insulting him or saying hurtful things. I think it's time the riot community GROWS THE HELL UP! if you can't handle when someone disagrees with you or doesn't like what you're doing then you are never going to make it through life without thinking everyone you come across is toxic. Too many people in this community are way too sensitive. If you don't want to see someone complain about your play style press tab and use the MUTE button. Here's a little tip for all those sensitive sallies it there... Get some thicker skin or you're likely to be crying yourself to sleep for many nights to come. It saddens me to see someone so bent up over losing a game that you would try to go after their job in real life! What kind of person does that make you? He was complaining about your game choices, so you find it okay to try to potentially destroy his career. Who is the real toxic person here?

> [{quoted}](name=MFSMURFED ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KeZLXXXH,comment-id=000100010001,timestamp=2018-12-10T14:55:23.040+0000)
>
> I think that summoners need to start learning the difference between complaining and flaming. Everyone is so quick to use the word " toxic" or "flame" at anything that is not in agreement with what they are saying. I see absolutely ZERO flaming or toxicity in this thread. Yes the riot employee may not be praising the talon, but he certainly isn't name calling, he's not insulting him or saying hurtful things. I think it's time the riot community GROWS THE HELL UP! if you can't handle when someone disagrees with you or doesn't like what you're doing then you are never going to make it through life without thinking everyone you come across is toxic. Too many people in this community are way too sensitive. If you don't want to see someone complain about your play style press tab and use the MUTE button. Here's a little tip for all those sensitive sallies it there... Get some thicker skin or you're likely to be crying yourself to sleep for many nights to come. It saddens me to see someone so bent up over losing a game that you would try to go after their job in real life! What kind of person does that make you? He was complaining about your game choices, so you find it okay to try to potentially destroy his career. Who is the real toxic person here?

1. If you read PB regularly you could see occasionall complaints about feeders and people getting banned for calling some1 out for feeding. And according to the community, calling some1 out for feeding is considered harrassment and it is punishable.

2. I don't care about stuff like this (I dont mind toxicity in general) but if it was a regular player in question, the majority of players would agree this is toxic and should be bannable. But when rioter does it, every1 turns a blind eye it seems. Riot created the rules, so it makes sense that they should follow these rules, right?

3. No1 is trying to destroy the career of that rioter. But the thing is, if players see that rioters are calling people out on feeding, they might do that aswell, cuz if they're doing it, then it's fine right? And that might result in more toxicity, the thing that player HAAAAATE. So if anything that rioter should aknowledge this and at least apologise.

tl;dr it's no big deal by itself, but it sends a bad message.

Let me define this for you straight from Google so we can get on the same page of what toxic is. "Toxic: capable of causing serious harm to a person's health and wellbeing. ... Whether exhibited by you personally or by another major figure in your life, these behaviors can rightfully be classed as toxic because of their negative effect on your mental health and wellbeing.". So again I say learn how to use that word properly. Having mistakes pointed out helps you learn. When yo go to your job and you make a mistake do you report your boss for pointing it out? Do you call your boss toxic for pointing out mistakes? Or is that in fact how you learn to avoid them.

Having something pointed out they you may be doing wrong is fine. If your boss calls you a good for nothing dumb fuck who should quit so you stop holding everyone back. Then he's toxic. That's about the level the rioter was on in this game. He didn't point out mistakes, he told talon repeatedly that he was holding back the team and that he was useless. That's toxic behavior.
Can u show me quotes? Because you just twisted the hell out of those chat logs

"Wtf were you doing?"
"You throwing is toxic"
"Was fun playing with a soft inting talon"
"Of the 5 of us, only 1 is feeding this game"
"Everyone would be sad with how you're throwing and feeding this game..."

He directly and indirectly refers to ralon as a feeder, inter, and thrower. This is all harassment and leads to toxic behaviour.

> [{quoted}](name=Malignant Vemira,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KeZLXXXH,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-12-10T03:17:19.830+0000)
>
> We got invaded, shaco got FB, Morgana ganked mid at level 1, I got 4 sums off them, but no kill, tried to raom top, riot employee wouldnt cooperate in clearing red ward, romaed bot later, got  bot lane 2 kills, shaco ganked mid again, moragana ganked mid again, they dropped herald in my lane, got ganked bot morg and shaco again at tier 2 tower, i still havent flamed or complained, at this point i asked my jungler to please apply some pressure somewhere, word for word.
> 
> Apparently I'm not allowed to post the pictures of it.
> It's ok if Riot does it apparently though.
> 
> There's more but I don't know how to "edit" out the name in the video, and going frame by frame on youtube to capture the chat is REALLY tedious, i was in a 3 man party, he flamed in and post game
> 
> https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR1QV50.png
> https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR1RWy9.png
> https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR1Wz8u.png
> https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR1XZcM.png
> https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR1YT70.png
> https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR1ZXdA.png
> https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR20WRG.png
> https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR22Jlz.png
> https://cdn.pbrd.co/images/HR24HL2.png
> 

Dude, at least read your rant before posting.  Your spelling made my eyes bleed.

> [{quoted}](name=THE ELECTROCUCK,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KeZLXXXH,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2018-12-10T05:22:41.936+0000)
>
> Dude, at least read your rant before posting.  Your spelling made my eyes bleed.

really? you're going to flame me for making typos? like, does it matter? you can tell what im trying to communicate, im missing fingers from my military service, its super tedious for me to correct all of my typos when i try to type fast
I don't think you know what flaming means. And since when did you have to type fast to make a post?

You leave his 3 fingers alone goddammit. 

But for real though OP, none of this is flaming.
Well... For riot it actually this is flaming.  {{summoner:4}}
{{summoner:14}} confirmed XD, and yes rito has muted my other account for less than this

Actually that if flaming. I guess you dont know what flaming is, I say this because clearly the guy insulted him, "your spelling makes my eyes bleed." Its not something that should get anyone a penalty but it's still flaming. EX: dude the way you talk makes my ears bleed. <----flaming= roasting someone for something they did or do 

....just saying . I can kinda see the type of player you are XD nothing but CY@ every kill.

Love your response. Everyone dose mistakes but you don't need to judge them. I think he realy is that kind of player CY@. And about that report i think that especially riots cant use things like (WTF) or your (inting) xD cus thats how pages like this are created.
-Sad for this rioter :>

This dude was the talon and went 3/14/2 that game and is going to try and call this rioter out like he was a victim? Bro you've inted every game in your match history. His "toxicity" was literally stating the obvious. How else is he suppose to talk to a player who's clearly trolling his game? "Good try, you'll get em next time! After 14 deaths with no success!"

How about playing the games you queue for instead of trying to bait reports? And while we at it, how about riot actually punishing players like this instead of just the people who call trolls trolls in chat?
How many threads have been posted on this board where someone was chat restricted/banned for calling out a troll in a manner very similar to what Riot [redacted] was doing in this game?

I'm not convinced the player in question really is a Rioter, but regardless, I'd be genuinely surprised to see these logs result in a punishment. This is a mild expression of frustration. It's not a positive log, for sure, but most of the screencaps are entirely devoid of toxicity.

> [{quoted}](name=Jo0o,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KeZLXXXH,comment-id=001f00000001,timestamp=2018-12-10T12:48:52.672+0000)
>
> I'm not convinced the player in question really is a Rioter, but regardless, I'd be genuinely surprised to see these logs result in a punishment. This is a mild expression of frustration. It's not a positive log, for sure, but most of the screencaps are entirely devoid of toxicity.

Well people got banned for chatlogs like these ones. And only Rioters can have 'Riot' in their name btw.

I've seen people squeek through that filter before, one way or another.

And no, I don't think I've seen anybody banned for logs like. Maybe this sort of talk repeated constantly across 40+ lines of chat. Getting tilted and getting into an argument isn't typically enough to get banned; it's when the argument takes over chat and derails the game that Riot gets pissed. Saying things like "wtf were you doing" once in a while isn't negative enough to trip the system. Feel free to prove me wrong, of course. I can't swear that a Rioter wouldn't get special treatment, after all.

> [{quoted}](name=Jo0o,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KeZLXXXH,comment-id=001f0000000100000000,timestamp=2018-12-10T13:13:30.147+0000)
>
> I've seen people squeek through that filter before, one way or another.
> 
> And no, I don't think I've seen anybody banned for logs like. Maybe this sort of talk repeated constantly across 40+ lines of chat. Getting tilted and getting into an argument isn't typically enough to get banned; it's when the argument takes over chat and derails the game that Riot gets pissed. Saying things like "wtf were you doing" once in a while isn't negative enough to trip the system. Feel free to prove me wrong, of course. I can't swear that a Rioter wouldn't get special treatment, after all.

Imma just say what I said to Kei

> You don't see lines where rioter is saying, and I quote:
> 
> 'You throwing is toxic'
> 
> 'was fun playing with a soft inting Talon'
> 
> 3rd and 4th picture are showing that rioter is blaming Talon, or how people on PB like to call, harrassing him for being the only lane who lost and saying he threw and fed in the game
> 
> 6th picture shows rioter pointing out Talon's actions
> 
> and finally 8th picture shows him ONCE again blaming Talon for feeding and throwing
> 
> 
> In total, rioter called out Talon several times for feeding/throwing, with one time going on mini-rant about how he's the only lane which lost (throwing all fault at him)
> 
> Last time I checked people were getting banned for shit like these and other Board users pointed these sort of things as 'toxic', and I'm pretty sure you were one of them aswell.
> So stop pretending like Rioter did nothing, cuz he was definitely toxic in this game.

Either Rioter was toxic as shit or the whole PB was wrong the entire time and calling some1 out for feeding/throwing isn't bannable offense.

It's a couple lines of text. It's not _not_ toxic, but it's hardly "toxic as shit". 

Look, I've got no agenda. If a Rioter crosses the line, burn them for all I care. I just truly don't see the line being crossed here. Objective low-level toxicity (not the "low-level toxicity" that banned players claim after the fact) isn't punished by the system unless it's repeated beyond reason. 

But hey, we could trade words on our evaluation of this endlessly. I have a more direct solution: If you can show me a chat log, posted on these boards in its entirety, of a player being punished for similar logs, in a single game, as defined by at least some third-party interpretation by our peers on these boards... I'll personally request that I be banned from the boards for a month. You've got my word on that. Note that absent personal punishment history information I'm giving you a LOT of leeway here to find somebody on very thin ice.

> [{quoted}](name=Jo0o,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KeZLXXXH,comment-id=001f000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-12-10T13:41:03.072+0000)
>
> It's a couple lines of text. It's not _not_ toxic, but it's hardly "toxic as shit". 
> 
> Look, I've got no agenda. If a Rioter crosses the line, burn them for all I care. I just truly don't see the line being crossed here. Objective low-level toxicity (not the "low-level toxicity" that banned players claim after the fact) isn't punished by the system unless it's repeated beyond reason. 

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/ALsKWJcs-did-i-seriously-get-banned-for-this

But you get permabanned for much less if you had a history of saying a ZT word and learned your lesson.

As gentlemen say in such situations, beyond reason my ass.

> [{quoted}](name=Jo0o,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KeZLXXXH,comment-id=001f00000001,timestamp=2018-12-10T12:48:52.672+0000)
>
> I'm not convinced the player in question really is a Rioter, but regardless, I'd be genuinely surprised to see these logs result in a punishment. This is a mild expression of frustration. It's not a positive log, for sure, but most of the screencaps are entirely devoid of toxicity.

People get punished for less. People never get their punishment removed if their reform card contains much milder behaviour if it can be perceived as negative.

14 deaths with no success? But he got 3 kills and helped with 3 that makes about 5 successes everyone get a losing streak I dont care how good you are you can't solo carry every game and sometimes you get caught out early game and it lets the other team snowball if you know the game so much why flame when the guy just wants some justice. If the guys is on a losing streak then get flamed it's not a good feeling. He was the biggest man by actually reporting it instead of flaming back like most of us would do

so report him.  if he has a history of mild toxicity like this, he will be punished, just like everyone else.  If you so incline, you can also submit a support ticket with all these pictures (don't even need name scrubbed out) just like everyone else.
I mean, I'd love to post the chat, I have video too, but it keeps getting removed lol, feels good man.

You can post your video and pictures ifbyou edit out the name. 

You can leave the "Riot" part of their name in there and it'llbe fine. That way it will kind of show that you are playing with a Rioter.
Can I have the video? If you already uploaded it somewhere just throw the link at me, if not send it to me via FB/E-mail etc. I'm curious to see what actually happened.

Lol if that's flame then my games would be a living hell for you.
Reminds me of this one time, where I said to my toplaner not to take my farm as I was the midlander and we both were on my lane and he made a big fuss out of it too. Even though I pinged him only one time and then said it politely.

Anyway. If people flame you just mute them (life saving advice).

But know that saying "this guy is inting cuz hes feeding" ain't no flame xd
"/all report this f#cking noob, tr4sh player omfg aut1stic child I hope u die" is. And it would be really bad from a Riot Employee.
Hope you see this.
Glhf. {{champion:91}}  {{sticker:katarina-love}} {{sticker:leblanc-funny}}

Actually calling a player out for his poor play is against the tos. If I say you are feeding and trolling stop it. I would be able to be reported and punished. You can't call out poor play because it is accusing.

I came here expecting a cry thread about a Rioter barely saying anything bad to you, and you blowing it out of proportion. It had all the signs.

* clickbait title
* downvoted
* Removed stuff by mods

But instead I see a rioters being legit toxic to you, yet you didnâ€™t even provoke him, just played badly (presumably). Hell in a lot of them Leona stood up for you AGAINST him. Thatâ€™s pretty messed up.
Yooo rito system is just crap, get falsely reported by toxic ppl and you get a banned. They seriously need to fix their shit doesn't make sense.
